name: Stardust (itch) (HamzaMcKhan)
description:
Web version coming soon!

Stardust is a space-themed hyper casual endless flying game, where you stay alive by dodging or firing at the asteroids, for as long as possible. The longer you survive, the higher your score.

It is intended to be an aesthetic therapeutic experience, that entrances you and takes you on a beautiful dreamy journey through the shiny glittering parts of the cosmos. The retro space theme has been carefully chosen along with the sci-fi lo-fi music. You can almost meditate by playing the game.

Score points, unlock better spaceships and challenge your friends, to see if they can beat your high score.

Feel free to provide feedback and stay tuned. This is going to go big.
